input.sentences: a group of kids is gathered waiting on the parade to happen .
a large tractor driven by a man is leading the pack .
a small float filled with children goes down the road .
a group of horses are led down the street .
in the rear are two babies in a wagon having fun .
output.sentences: The children were excited about the coming parade
The floats were happy and playful
The horses made the parade even more fun for the children
Wagon rides are the best way to end the day!
